channel.title: Posts on Younsik.Tech
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Younsik.Tech

item.title: Iterm2 & Homebrew 설치
item.description: NOTICE 2022.04.06. 기준으로 M1 Mac & Intel Mac 설치 과정이 동일함 Iterm2 설치 1. 다음 공식 사이트에 접속해서 최신 버전을 다운로드 받습니다 공식 사이트 링크 2. DMG 파일을 설치합니다 3. Iterm2 Preference 세팅을 합니다 (선택 & 원하는 값으로 변경) 1) 제목 표시줄 스타일 변경 Appearance > Theme: Minimal 2) 제목 표시줄 아래 1px 라인 제거 Appearance > Windows > Show line under title bar when the tab bar is not visible: Don't Check 3) Text 관련 세팅 (폰트, 자간 etc.

item.title: Base Sample
item.description: This sample post tests the followings: Category, sub-category nesting in the sidebar. Hero image and other images are in images folder inside this post directory. Different media rendering like image, tweet, YouTube video, Vimeo video etc. Image Sample Tweet Sample Owl bet you'll lose this staring contest 🦉 pic.twitter.com/eJh4f2zncC — San Diego Zoo Wildlife Alliance (@sandiegozoo) October 26, 2021 YouTube Video Sample Vimeo Video Sample

item.title: Small Talk
item.description: Greeting! This is an introduction post. This post tests the followings: Hero image is in the same directory as the post. This post should be at top of the sidebar. Post author should be the same as specified in author.yaml file.
